channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Our HOA fees are too high’: Do my husband and I sell our $700K condo and rent by the beach?
item.description: “My husband, 71, and I, 66, are retired, with total combined assets of $1.5 million.”

item.title: Yes, stock investors, there is a Santa Claus rally. No, it isn’t coming early.
item.description: Wall Street wants you to believe that a year-end stock-market rally starts now.

item.title: My brother is the trustee of our parents’ $10 million estate. He’s threatened to bleed the estate dry. What now?
item.description: “He is paying himself $40 per hour or $1,600 per week to manage the estate.”

item.title: McDonald’s and other companies are calling out the impact of SNAP delays on consumers
item.description: One analyst says payment delays across states are likely, even after the government’s reopening.

item.title: I’m 83 and will have $500K if I sell my house. My estranged wife wants me to join her in Colombia. Do I go?
item.description: “I can just barely handle my expenses with a mortgage payment of $984 and an income of $3,800.”
